Title: Metro UI for NopCommerce
Description:
Free nopCommerce theme using the Metro UI CSS (a set of styles to create a site
 with an interface similar to Windows 8.)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Free nopCommerce theme using the Metro UI CSS (a set of styles to create a site
with an interface similar to Windows 8.)


This theme includes:

- Metro UI / Windows 8 Style
- Fixed Navigation Bar
- Dropdown Category Menu's
- Search panel - slides in and out
- Responsive design - mobile/tablet friendly
- Metro UI / Windows 8 Style Carousel (Optional Plugin)

Additional information on the project is available here: Project Information.
